datamanager.TITLE: Title
datamanager.ASSIGN_ATTRIBUTES: Assign an attribute for each element, and a link
datamanager.CONNECTION_COLLECTION_DESC: Displays all data collections that belong to the Stakeholder
datamanager.CONNECTION_SEARCH_DESC: Displays the Searches that the Stakeholder can perform
datamanager.CONTEXT_DATA_DESC: Displays the data of the context entity of this page
datamanager.DATA_DYNAMIC_DESC: Dynamic Data: comes from your Bizagi project, whether from entity collections, searches or pending cases.
datamanager.DATA_FIXED_DESC: Fixed content: allows you to set fixed texts and images (from the gallery or your own). Fixed content will not pull data from Bizagi.
datamanager.DISCARD_CHANGES_MSG:
Are you sure you want to exit?.
Unsaved changes will lost.
datamanager.HELP_FIXED: Configuring Fixed Content is pretty easy, all you need to do is type in the text you want to display along with images or other UI elements. Add as many of these as illustrated in the below sample.
datamanager.INPUTS_NOT_MAPPED: You haven't pulled data for all elements
datamanager.INPUTS_NOT_MAPPED_MSG: There are elements without pulled data. Would you like to save with the current configuration?
datamanager.MAP_DATA_BOXES_HELP: Select each of the boxes to assign the data to be shown (attributes and links)
datamanager.SAME_LINK_FOR_ALL_ATTRIBUTES: I want the same link page for all attributes
datamanager.SELECT_DATA: Select the source of the data
datamanager.SELECT_EACH_FIELD_TITLE: Select each field and connect the data. You also can turn on and off the fields.
datamanager.SELECT_DATA_DESC: Select where the data will be pulled from.
datamanager.SELECT_STAKEHOLDERS_DESC: Select the Stakeholders that will be able to see the data.
datamanager.WANT_BIZAGI_DATA: Do you want to pull data from Bizagi instead?
datamanager.WANT_DISPLAY_DATA: Do you want to display static data?
datamanager.WARNING_UNMAPPED: Reconfigure the dynamic data of your control

managesearch.HELP_TEXT: Configure the search control to filter an existing collection
managesearch.NO_CONTEXTUALIZED_PAGES: Keep in mind that the contextualized pages are not listed below.
managesearch.SELECT_BUNDLE: Select the bundle for pulling the data in the search control.
managesearch.SELECT_BUNDLE_FIELDS: Select one of the bundle fields.
managesearch.STEP_FOUR_DESCRIPTION_TEXT: This is the last step, just give a name to the search control and  to the Search button. And if you want to see all the configuration click in the summary button and check all.
managesearch.STEP_FOUR_TITLE: Set the name and the button
managesearch.STEP_ONE_TITLE: Select bundle for pulling the data
managesearch.STEP_TWO_DESCRIPTION_TEXT: The data of this field will be the data the search control take in mind when the user makes a search.
managesearch.TITLE: Title:

modifyfields.LABEL: Label
modifyfields.TEXT_INFO_PART_ONE: Edit the design properties of each element like
modifyfields.TEXT_INFO_PART_TWO: font size, font family or color.
modifyfields.TEXT_INFO_PART_THREE: Here you can turn on or off each element. Leave at least two elements selected.

STEP_1.TITLE: Bizagi Controls
STEP_1.CONTENT: Add texts, images, buttons and collections. Only drag and drop them into the page.

onboarding.CONGRATULATIONS_MSG: Now, that you know the basic steps to create your site, you can continue exploring Bizagi Sites one your own. If you have doubts, visit our user guide.

MENU.STEP_2: Edit, modify and design the elements for your site
MENU.STEP_3: Change or add pages to your site
MENU.STEP_4: Preview your site in different devices

STEP_2.TITLE: Edit elements and controls
STEP_2.CONTENT: Choose the control that you need to edit. You can connect it to your Bizagi data, change its design, duplicate it, set the visibility or delete it.

STEP_3.TITLE: Change or add new pages
STEP_3.CONTENT: Add new pages to your sites. Change their names or organize them as you wish.

STEP_4.TITLE: Preview how your site is going to look
STEP_4.CONTENT: Preview your site for different devices to have a better idea of how your site will be seen by each Stakeholder.

STEP_5.TITLE: Publish your site
STEP_5.CONTENT: Once you have all the content ready for your site, you can publish it. You can see your site’s URL and update its contents.

onboarding.TITLE: Welcome to sites designer

settings.LANGUAGE_MANAGER_CULTURE_CUSTOM_TEXT: Once you make any change in culture format, you can return to the original language format by turning off this switch.
settings.LANGUAGE_MANAGER_CULTURE_CUSTOM_TITLE: Do you want to personalize your formats?
settings.LANGUAGE_MANAGER_CULTURE_TEXT: This is the current visualization of your formats. You can customize some preferences to show data such as date, time and numbers in a friendly way.
settings.LANGUAGE_MANAGER_DELETE_LANGUAGE: Are you sure you want to delete this language?
settings.LANGUAGE_MANAGER_DESCRIPTION: Add and manage all the languages of your site.
settings.MULTILANGUAGE_DESCRIPTION: Multilingual site is a tool that helps you translate your site to different languages.
settings.MULTILANGUAGE_DESCRIPTION_TEXT1: Keep the same design in all languages.
settings.MULTILANGUAGE_DESCRIPTION_TEXT2: Make a custom translation with an easy-to-use translation interface.
settings.MULTILANGUAGE_DESCRIPTION_TEXT3: Users can navigate through the pages easily
settings.MULTILANGUAGE_FIRST_TITLE: Select an additional language for your site
settings.MULTILANGUAGE_MAIN_TITLE: Select the default language of your site
settings.MULTILANGUAGE_MAIN_DESCRIPTION1: Select the current language of your site and a flag to represent it.
settings.MULTILANGUAGE_MAIN_DESCRIPTION2: Once you choose a main language, you can't change it.
settings.MULTILANGUAGE_SUMMARY_TITLE: Your new multilingual site will have this characteristics:
settings.MULTILANGUAGE_SUMMARY_DESCRIPTION1: You can customize your text and images for each individual language.
settings.MULTILANGUAGE_SUMMARY_DESCRIPTION2: Design changes like editing your layout will affect all languages.

stakeholders.DESCRIPTION:
Stakeholders are the final users of your site. Enabling them allows you to map dynamic data relevant for them.

Keep in mind that you can disable Stakeholders at any time. Your site can be affected by this if you already have controls configured for that Stakeholder.
stakeholders.DISABLE_STAKEHOLDERS_MESSAGE:
You are about to disable the Stakeholder {{stakeholderName}}. This action will affect the visibility of some pages and their data.

Are you sure you want to continue?
stakeholders.DISABLE_STAKEHOLDERS_TITLE: Wait! be careful with this action
stakeholders.NO_STAKEHOLDERS_MESSAGE: Building a site makes sense when you have at least one Stakeholder selected, otherwise who are you building this experience for?
stakeholders.NO_STAKEHOLDERS_TITLE: Wait! You can't build Sites without Stakeholders
